
## Explore starwars dataset

```{r}
head(starwars)
```

```{r}
dim(starwars)

```

```{r}
ggplot(data = starwars, aes(x = height)) +
  geom_histogram()
```

```{r}
# --- dependendent variable should be on the y axis (e.g. y depends on x - mass depends on height)
ggplot(data = starwars, aes(x = height, y = mass, color = sex)) +
  geom_point()
```
